root.name: Hunters 2
root.description: OverviewIn Hunters 2, players take control of a squad of futuristic bounty hunters (the titular Hunters) who operate aboard a starship in the year 2982.To progress, the player can choose between scripted story-based missions or randomly generated "daily contracts". Completing missions will earn credits which can be used to purchase new weapons and armor from a dynamic marketplace. As Hunters gain experience, various "talents" can be unlocked which confers new abilities. Some abilities are tied to that character's class.
